Text: Great work as usual, thank you.

Well, on that same image you can see darker red spots on the inside of her pussy lips (her major lips, not her minor lips).  I think that's what he's referring to.  They may or may not be a "problem", we'll never know.  They could be completely harmless, or they could be some kind of disease.  They could also be temporary, like something from dryness or time in an environment that she's not used to.

ATK tends to feature less perfect women, and that's what I think we like about them.  Real women, truly sexy women, are the ones we meet in real life.  They have flaws just like we do.

The spots might be a little weird, but I don't think they take a way from her sex appeal.
